features: 【Crystal-Clear Reflections, Unmatched Safety】 Crafted with high-quality, crystal-clear glass, our rectangular mirror ensures sharp and accurate images. Worried about accidents? Fear not, thanks to the shatterproof film on the back, offering added protection against sputtering damage

【Aesthetic Appeal Meets Functionality】 Embrace modern sophistication with our matte metal-framed bathroom wall mirror. The sturdy frame, complete with protective round corners, guarantees longevity while seamlessly blending with any décor style

【Effortless Installation, Endless Possibilities】 Discover the ease of installation with our wall mirror, offering two versatile mounting options - vertical or horizontal. Whether hung or leaned, it effortlessly enhances your living space. It's dimensions (60x90 CM) make it ideal as a wall mirror for dressing or fitness routines. From bathroom to bedrooms, entryways to living rooms, it adds a touch of charm to any setting

【Wide Application, Redefines Your Home Décor Experience】 A ideal contemporary mirror for wall decor with matte metal frame, very classic, perfectly goes with any decor, suitable for using in bathroom, vanity, bedroom, living room, dinning room, entryway. Elevate your home décor with our Wall Mirror - where safety, style, and functionality converge to create a truly remarkable experience

【Complete Package, Perfect Present】 Your purchase includes everything you need for a hassle-free setup deep framed wall mirror, instructions, french cleats, leveler, and screws. It's not just a mirror; it's a thoughtful gift for your loved ones for brithday,christmas and other present giving moments
